    • Method Detail

      • knapsackSumA

        public static int knapsackSumA(int[] w,
               int n,
               int limit)
        This does the knapsack problem recursively, without storing the items
        Parameters:
        w - List of weights
        n - What stage you are currently at
        limit - The limit of weights you can carry in the knapsack
        Returns:
        int the optimal weight of the knapsack

      • knapsackSumB

        public static int knapsackSumB(int[] w,
               int n,
               int limit,
               java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> list)
        This does the knapsack problem recursively, while storing which items are used
        Parameters:
        w - List of weights
        n - What stage you are currently at
        limit - The limit of weight you can carry in the knapsack
        list - A list of the objects in the knapsack
        Returns:
        int the optimal weight of the knapsack

      • getFileNames

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getFileNames(java.lang.String[] args)
        This gets the list of all the file names in the main text file
        Parameters:
        args - arguments given for program in runtime
        Returns:
        ArrayList of the file names within the given main file

      • formatPrint

        public static void formatPrint(java.io.PrintWriter out,
               int limit,
               java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> usedWeights,
               int optimal,
               int[] w)
        Formats output to be printed to the file
        Parameters:
        out - PrintWriter for ouput file
        limit - limit of the knapsack problem
        usedWeights - List of the weights used in that knapsack problem
        optimal - The weight returned by the knapsack problem
        w - Array of weights void

      • processFile

        public static void processFile(java.io.PrintWriter out,

        Does all the knapsack stuff for the given file, and then sends the results to be printed in the output file
